device_offline: The device seems to be offline. Is it powered on, and connected to the internet?
settings_unsupported: Some of the changed settings are not supported by the device:
setting_values_unsupported: Some of the changed values are not supported by the device:
setting_unsupported: __label__ is not supported by the device
setting_value_unsupported: Value is not supported for __label__ by the device
error_min_max_brightness: The minimum brightness must be less than the maximum.
error_refreshing_token: Could not refresh login. Try repairing one of your devices.

qrcode.title: Scan QR Code
qrcode.body:
Open the Tuya Smart or Smart Life app.
Tap Me in the bottom right corner.
Tap the scan icon in the top-right corner.
Scan the QR Code.

usercode.title: Enter User Code
usercode.body:
Open the Tuya Smart or Smart Life app.
Tap Me in the bottom right corner.
Tap the cog icon in the top right corner.
Then tap Account and Security.
Find your User Code at the bottom, and enter it here.
